name: Plotect Tree
description:
Defend against ghouls by building up your defenses with wood and turrets and protect your plant friend named plot!

Controls

W, Up arrow, 8 numpad, Space - Jump

A, Left arrow, 4 numpad - Left

D, Right arrow, 6 numpad - Right

S, Down arrow, 5 numpad - Picks up/ Puts down plot (thats the plant friend :) )

Q, Enter, 7 numpad - Opens plot shop when near plot

F, 0 numpad, numpad + - Sends next round

Escape - Pause/ Exit

Mouse wheel scroll up - Equips stick (wag it like a certain remote)

Mouse wheel scroll down - Equips gun

Left click - Shoots gun

Right click - Places wood/ Deletes wood

Every round more and more enemies will spawn. every 15 rounds a big enemy will spawn. make sure to prepare for round 60.

The stick is better for smaller enemies, while the gun is better for bigger enemies. If you destroying an enemy you will gain Soul, which can be used to buy upgrades and equipment at the plot. If enemies touch the plot, you and the plot will die, so protect the plot as best you can!

This game was made for the GDevelop Game Jam #1!
